snippet.title: OPUS: Prism Peak Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming Fall 2025 - Wishlist on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1947910/OPUS_Prism_Peak/

OPUS: Prism Peak is a narrative-driven adventure about a weary adult who stumbles into a mysterious, ethereal realm. Using your trusty camera, you’ll explore its surreal landscapes,  uncover its mysteries, and slowly piece together the path back to the world you once knew.

▶OPUS: Prism Peak Official News
https://x.com/sigonogames
https://x.com/SHUEISHA_GAMES

©SIGONO INC. / SHUEISHA, SHUEISHA GAMES
Development：SIGONO
Pubulisher：SHUEISHA GAMES

#PrismPeak #OPUSPrismPeak
